config.mio_zoomer.title: Mio Zoomer Config
config.mio_zoomer.features.cinematic_cam:
Defines the cinematic camera while zooming.
"Off" disables the cinematic camera.
"Vanilla" uses Vanilla's cinematic camera.
"Multiplied" is a multiplied variant of "Vanilla".
config.mio_zoomer.features.reduce_sensit: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.mio_zoomer.features.zoom_transiti:
Adds transitions between zooms.
"Off" disables transitions.
"Smooth" replicates Vanilla's dynamic FOV.
"Linear" removes the smoothness.
config.mio_zoomer.features.zoom_mode.too:
The behavior of the zoom key.
"Hold" needs the zoom key to be hold.
"Toggle" has the zoom key toggle the zoom.
"Persistent" makes the zoom permanent.
config.mio_zoomer.features.zoom_scrollin: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.mio_zoomer.features.extra_key_bin:
Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key.
A restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
config.mio_zoomer.features.spyglass_depe:
Determines how the zoom will depend on the spyglass.
"Require Item" will make zooming require a spyglass.
"Replace Zoom" will replace spyglass's zoom with Mio Zoomer's zoom.
"Both" will apply both options at the same time.
The "Require Item" option is configurable through the mio_zoomer:zoom_dependencies item tag.
Adds an overlay in the screen during zoom.
"Vignette" uses a vignette as the overlay.
"Spyglass" uses the spyglass overlay with the vignette texture.
The vignette texture can be found at: assets/mio_zoomer/textures/misc/zoom_overlay.png
config.mio_zoomer.values.tooltip: Contains precise configuration of the zoom.
config.mio_zoomer.values.zoom_divisor.to: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.mio_zoomer.values.minimum_zoom_di: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.mio_zoomer.values.maximum_zoom_di: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.mio_zoomer.values.upper_scroll_st:
The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the maximum zoom divisor.
Used by zoom scrolling.
config.mio_zoomer.values.lower_scroll_st:
The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the minimum zoom divisor.
Used by zoom scrolling.
config.mio_zoomer.values.smooth_multipli: The multiplier used for smooth transitions.
config.mio_zoomer.values.cinematic_multi: The multiplier used for the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.mio_zoomer.values.minimum_linear_: The minimum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.mio_zoomer.values.maximum_linear_: The maximum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.tooltip: Contains options that are unlikely to be changed from the defaults.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.reset_zoom_with: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.forget_zoom_div: If enabled, the current zoom divisor is forgotten once zooming is done.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.unbind_conflict: If pressed, then the "Save Toolbar Activator" keybind will be unbound if there's a conflict with the zoom key.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.use_spyglass_te: If enabled, the spyglass overlay texture is used instead of Mio Zoomer's overlay texture.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.use_spyglass_so: If enabled, the zoom will use spyglass sounds on zooming in and out.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.show_restrictio: Shows toasts when the server imposes a restriction.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.print_owo_on_st: Prints a random owo in the console when the game starts.
config.mio_zoomer.tweaks.hide_zoom_overl: Hides the zoom overlay while the HUD's hidden.
The value is below the allowed range! The minimum is %s!
The value is below the legal limits!
The value is above the allowed range! The maximum is %s!
The value is above the legal limits!
config.mio_zoomer.widget.bounded_int.bel: The value is below the allowed range! The minimum is %s!
config.mio_zoomer.widget.bounded_int.abo: The value is above the allowed range! The maximum is %s!
config.mio_zoomer.reset.tooltip: Contains a way to reset this mod's settings
config.mio_zoomer.reset.preset.tooltip:
The preconfiguration which will be used after a reset.
"Default" resets to the default settings.
"Classic" makes the mod imitate OptiFine's zoom.
"Persistent" is based on the "Persistent" zoom mode.
"Spyglass" emulates the spyglass zoom.
config.mio_zoomer.reset.reset_settings.t: Resets the settings to the preset.
command.mio_zoomer.title: Mio Zoomer Information
command.mio_zoomer.restrictions.tooltip: Shows all restrictions imposed on the mod.
command.mio_zoomer.restrictions.acknowle: This server has imposed the following restrictions:
command.mio_zoomer.restrictions.force_zo: The zoom divisor has been locked to %s
command.mio_zoomer.restrictions.force_sp: This zoom replaces the spyglass' zoom
This zoom requires a spyglass but also replaces its zoom
The spyglass overlay has been enabled
command.mio_zoomer.restrictions.no_restr: This server allows this mod, and therefore, hasn't imposed any restrictions
This server didn't impose any restrictions
